About me

A little about me

Experienced in Ruby on Rails and JavaScript based programming with a background in hospitality. Sales driven professional with exceptional communication skills. Possesses a strong ability to mitigate difficult situations through effective communication with team members and patrons. Customer satisfaction is the highest priority which generates repeated business and brand loyalty.
Languages: ​Ruby, Rails, SQL, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, REST/API,Test Writing
In spare time I like to read, draw, spend time with my dog and family and let's not forget that coffee is involved in all of that!
